mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_img ( free_id, img_name, ori_img_name, img_url, repimg_yn ) VALUES (#{freeId}, #{imgName}, #{oriImgName}, #{imgUrl}, #{repImgYn})
mapper.update: UPDATE free_img SET img_name = #{imgName}, ori_img_name = #{oriImgName}, img_url = #{imgUrl}, repimg_yn = #{repImgYn}, created_at = now() WHERE free_img_id = #{freeImgId}
mapper.select: SELECT free_img_id, free_id, img_name, ori_img_name, img_url, repimg_yn, created_at FROM free_img WHERE free_id = #{freeId} ORDER BY free_img_id
SELECT free_img_id AS freeImgId, free_id AS freeId, img_name AS imgName, ori_img_name AS oriImgName, img_url AS imgUrl, repimg_yn AS repImgYn FROM free_img WHERE free_img_id = #{freeImgId}
SELECT * FROM free_img WHERE free_id = #{freeId} AND repimg_yn = 'Y' LIMIT 1
